abstract: Should JPMorgan’s investment in the Bridge Trust Company be approved by Chinese government regulators, it would be the latest effort by the American banking giant to follow its rivals into China.
snippet: Should JPMorgan’s investment in the Bridge Trust Company be approved by Chinese government regulators, it would be the latest effort by the American banking giant to follow its rivals into China.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is poised to move further into China, agreeing to buy a 19.9 percent stake in a small Chinese trust company, according to a person briefed on the matter.

headline.main: JPMorgan Adds Small Foothold in China

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
